messages.content: Once our precious green space is lost, it is lost forever

messages.title: Improving Transport
messages.content: Standing up to rail companies to get us the very best deal

messages.title: Better Education
messages.content: Making sure all our children get the best start in life

messages.title: A personal message from Oliver Dowden
messages.content: Hertsmere is home for me; it was born and grew up here and now building my own life and family with my wife and two young children. I know the pressures that face local families and I have the determination, with a strong mandate from you, to protect our precious green spaces, to demand improvements for our overcrowded and delayed trains, and I have a 5-year track record as the rail activist supporter to continue doing just that. I have spent my recent years as a senior political adviser; first to the Prime Minister working on how technology and internet reform can achieve economic growth and more importantly help protect our children. Surrounding myself with the inspiring community of Hertsmere represents all that I hold dear and we are united in wanting to effectively make sure our local concerns are heard loud and clear and to ensure our children's future security so we can be confident that they can grow and thrive together with confidence in a safer, fairer society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to protecting Hertsmere's precious green spaces.
Improving transport by standing up to rail companies to negotiate better services.
Ensuring all children in Hertsmere receive the best possible start in life through better education.
